A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time fan since 1977\, having watched all the movies in the series a gazilion times\, I really enjoyed this last SW instance. It was very entertaining\, visually stunning and full of surprises. Lots of opportunities to connect emotionally to characters and scenes. I don’t quite understand the backslash from some reviewers as I consider this movie as one of the best in the series!
